TASK: Format text as bold/italic
DOMAIN: office

STEPS:
1. Open LibreOffice Writer application
   REASONING: Need to launch a word processing application to perform text formatting tasks
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.02, y=0.98)

2. Wait for Start menu to appear
   REASONING: Allow time for the Start menu interface to fully render
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

3. Type application name to search
   REASONING: Quickly locate LibreOffice Writer through search functionality
   ACTION: TYPE("libreoffice writer")

4. Wait for search results
   REASONING: Allow the search to complete and display results
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

5. Click on LibreOffice Writer from search results
   REASONING: Launch the application from the search results
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.35)

6. Wait for LibreOffice Writer to fully load
   REASONING: Ensure the application interface is completely ready for interaction
   ACTION: WAIT(2.0)

7. Type sample text in the document
   REASONING: Need text content to apply bold and italic formatting to
   ACTION: TYPE("This text will be formatted as bold and italic.")

8. Select all the typed text
   REASONING: Must select the text before applying formatting; using Ctrl+A to select all
   ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "a")

9. Apply bold formatting to selected text
   REASONING: Use keyboard shortcut Ctrl+B to make the selected text bold
   ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "b")

10. Wait briefly for formatting to apply
    REASONING: Allow the application to process the bold formatting command
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

11. Apply italic formatting to the same text
    REASONING: Use keyboard shortcut Ctrl+I to make the already-bold text also italic
    ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "i")

12. Click elsewhere in document to deselect text
    REASONING: Deselect the text to clearly see the applied bold and italic formatting
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.6)

13. Task complete
    REASONING: Text has been successfully formatted with both bold and italic styles applied
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: The text "This text will be formatted as bold and italic." should appear in the LibreOffice Writer document with both bold and italic formatting applied simultaneously, making it appear heavy-weighted and slanted.
